name: Detroit Mountain
description: Located just one hour east of Fargo, ND, Detroit Mountain offers up a snowy platter of fun and explorable terrain with 45 skiable acres, 21 runs, 2 terrain parks, 2 chairlifts, 2 high-speed rope tows, and 2 magic carpet lifts. Detroit Mountain also caters to the first-timer, with a designated learning area featuring Terrain Based Learning. Detroit Mountain is also home to lift-served mountain biking during the summer months.
